desc: Can it be made possible for the system to show the name of the first capturer during the comparison stage in capturing, the name of the second capturer should only be shown once the capturer click the continue button to get to the comparison stage. The name should show like it does on the bottom right corner of the screenshot, but the name of the first capturer should only show once it gets to the comparison stage.
name: CW - 1st and 2nd capturer change
